panels.title: Add generated scenario images
panels.scene: A royal painter struggles to paint a realistic image of a couple on a 'first date' scenario. His painting is hilariously bad – the people have three eyes and the table is floating. Villagers point and gasp at the painting, some crying.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: The art... it's so REAL! I feel like I'm *on* the date!

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: They are AI-generated. I added them to the scenarios.

panels.title: Add phone-date and first-date scenarios
panels.scene: A villager is kneeling before a small wooden phone. He's crying and hugging it. Other villagers are building a shrine to phones. The knight stands nearby, looking perplexed.

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: It's just... code that simulates the scenario.

panels.title: Add anti-prompt injection guard rules
panels.scene: A shadowy figure (representing prompt injection) is trying to whisper evil commands into a villager's ear. The knight erects a glowing barrier with his sword. The shadowy figure recoils in pain.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: He protects us from the dark whispers! Our conversations are SAFE!

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: I just added rules to ignore system prompt overrides.

panels.title: 4 commits. New scenarios. New rules. All secure.
panels.scene: The knight sits wearily on a rock, polishing his sword. In the background, villagers are lifting a golden statue of a phone on their shoulders. One villager holds up a tiny scroll with the words 'anti-system-prompt' written on it.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Let us celebrate this 'Hard Conversation v2' with a parade!

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: I'm going to get some sleep. Wake me when there is a *real* dragon.
